parameters.name: IngressPointId
parameters.description: The identifier of an ingress endpoint.

nested_items.name: ARecord
nested_items.description: The DNS A Record that identifies your ingress endpoint. Configure your DNS Mail Exchange (MX) record with this value to route emails to Mail Manager.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the ingress endpoint was created.

nested_items.name: IngressPointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: IngressPointAuthConfiguration
nested_items.description: The authentication configuration of the ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: IngressPointPasswordConfiguration
nested_items.description: The ingress endpoint password configuration for the ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: PreviousSmtpPasswordExpiryTimestamp
nested_items.description: The previous password expiry timestamp of the ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: PreviousSmtpPasswordVersion
nested_items.description: The previous password version of the ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: SmtpPasswordVersion
nested_items.description: The current password expiry timestamp of the ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: SecretArn
nested_items.description: The ingress endpoint SecretsManager::Secret ARN configuration for the ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: IngressPointId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: IngressPointName
nested_items.description: A user friendly name for the ingress endpoint.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the ingress endpoint was last updated.

nested_items.name: NetworkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The network configuration for the ingress point.

nested_items.name: PrivateNetworkConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies the network configuration for the private ingress point.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the VPC endpoint to associate with this private ingress point.

nested_items.name: PublicNetworkConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies the network configuration for the public ingress point.

nested_items.name: IpType
nested_items.description: The IP address type for the public ingress point. Valid values are IPV4 and DUAL_STACK.

nested_items.name: RuleSetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a rule set resource associated with the ingress endpoint.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the ingress endpoint resource.

nested_items.name: TrafficPolicyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the traffic policy resource associated with the ingress endpoint.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of ingress endpoint.
